public class XsltDsTripleGenerator
extends Object
implements org.fcrepo.server.resourceIndex.TripleGenerator, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

Component for Fedora Commons repositories that uses XSLT to extract RDF from XML metadata and particularly to supply it to Fedora's Resource Index.
